resources.string: This element may not have an accessibility label readable by VoiceOver. All accessibility elements should have accessibility labels.
Consider adding an accessibility label to this element.

This element may have an accessibility label that ends in punctuation but doesn\'t have a text trait. If this element displays text visually, consider adding the <tt>UIAccessibilityStaticTrait</tt>, similar to <tt>UITextView</tt> or <tt>UILabel</tt>. If the element does not display text, consider removing the punctuation. Label found: <tt>$0</tt>
Consider removing the punctuation at the end of this element\'s accessibility label.

The element\'s text contrast ratio is $0. This ratio is based on a text colour of <tt>$1</tt> and background colour of <tt>$2</tt>. Consider increasing this element\'s text contrast ratio to $3 or greater.
Consider increasing this element\'s text foreground to background contrast ratio.
This element\'s size is <tt>$0</tt> by <tt>$1</tt> points. Consider making this touch target <tt>$2</tt> points wide and <tt>$2</tt> points high or larger.
Consider making this element\'s size larger.
